container.name: santiano.io v0.999 Open Beta GTM Web

parameter.value:
<!-- 
Current version : 0.999
Version Goal : Have other webanalysts play with it at the MeasureCamp Brussels 2017

                 _   _                    _

Hi, Thank you for Choosing santiano.io GTM framework

Let's begin.

Import santiano.io to your Google Tag Manager Dev Environment
In variables :
	Edit the list of authorizedDomainNamesList
	Edit gaUaProd
	Edit gaUaDev
Publish your Container
	Thank you :)

To get more help integrating santiano.io to your Website, please visit http://santiano.io

the new version of the website is under development with a full documentation to help you integrate it. 
	Meanwhile if you're in a hurry and need help... 
		Twitter : https://twitter.com/garylemasson
	If you want to contribute or report any issue you might find... the project is here!
		Github https://github.com/garylemasson/santiano.io




-->

<!-- 
santiano.io Changelog
Current Version : 0.999 Open BETA
Release Name : Measure Camp Brussels rocks or what ?
                 _   _                    _       
                | | (_)                  (_)

20/10/2017 - Version 0.999 - Let's call that a Beta!
- X Shape Container Sandwitch : OK
- File Downloads : OK
- gaEvents : OK
- External Clicks : OK
- Standard camelCase Variables : OK
- santianoEcommerce Event with Flat Architecture for GA Enhanced Ecommerce : OK
- Call of Test EE events with the 'santiano' page parameter in Dev Environment: OK

-->

tag.name: GA - Event Tag - Click on External Link
GA - Event Tag - Page Load performance

parameter.value:
<script>
// Evolution of Simo's tutorial on Page Load Times
// https://www.simoahava.com/analytics/page-load-time-universal-analytics/
// I Modified it to look good on Google Data Studio :)
// and added extra steps to show when we pages take more than 6 seconds to load
// By default this is executed randomly on 50% of your website pages

// !!! This depends on the gaEvent Tag
  
var perfData = window.performance.timing;
var pageLoadTime = perfData.domComplete - perfData.navigationStart;
var loadTime = "";

if (pageLoadTime < 1000) { loadTime = "0-1 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 2000) { loadTime = "1-2 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 3000) { loadTime = "2-3 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 4000) { loadTime = "3-4 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 5000) { loadTime = "4-5 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 6000) { loadTime = "5-6 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 7000) { loadTime = "6-7 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 8000) { loadTime = "7-8 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 9000) { loadTime = "8-9 seconds"; }
else if (pageLoadTime < 10000) { loadTime = "9-10 seconds"; }
else { loadTime = "More than 10 seconds"; }

dataLayer.push ({'event': 'gaEvent', 
                 'eventCategory': 'Page Load Performance', 
                 'eventAction': loadTime,
                 'eventLabel': '{{pageURL}}'
                });

</script>

<script>
  // grabs the santiano Ecommerce Event and plays with it for Google Enhanced Ecommerce
  var eventCommand = {{eventCommand}};
  var productList = {{productList}};

  
// ### If this is a product Impression
if (eventCommand == 'productImpression') {
  dataLayer.push({
    'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
    'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
    'eventAction': 'Product Impression',
    'eventLabel': 'On list:{{productImpressionListName}}',
    'eventValue': '0',
    'ecommerce': {
    	'currencyCode': '{{currencyCode}}',
    	'impressions': {{gaEeDynamicProductObject}}
    }
  });
  // possible evolution : Parse with a certain number of products each time :)
  // to make sure we don't push the Google Analytics to the hit limit size
  // var maxProductSentPerHit = 20;
  
// ### If this is a click to a product
} else if (eventCommand == 'productClick') {
  
  dataLayer.push({
    'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
    'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
    'eventAction': 'Product Click',
    'eventLabel': 'productId Is:' + productList[0].productId,
    'eventValue': productList[0].productUnitPrice,
    'ecommerce': {
      'currencyCode': '{{currencyCode}}',
      'click': {
        'actionField': {'list':'{{productImpressionListName}}'},
        'products': {{gaEeDynamicProductObject}}
       }
     }
  });
  
// ### If this is product page being seen
} else if (eventCommand == 'productDetail') {
  
  dataLayer.push({
    'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
    'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
    'eventAction': 'Product Detail',
    'eventLabel': 'productId Is:' + productList[0].productId,
    'eventValue': productList[0].productUnitPrice,
    'ecommerce': {
      'currencyCode': '{{currencyCode}}',
      'detail': {
        'products': {{gaEeDynamicProductObject}}
       }
     }
  });
  
  
// ### If a product is being added to Cart
} else if (eventCommand == 'productAddedToCart') {
  
  dataLayer.push({
      'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
      'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
      'eventAction': 'Product added to cart',
      'eventLabel': 'productId Is:' + productList[0].productId,
      'eventValue': '{{cartValue}}',
      'ecommerce': {
          'currencyCode': '{{currencyCode}}',
          'add': {
              'products': {{gaEeDynamicProductObject}}
          }
      }
  });  

// ### If a product is removed from Cart
} else if(eventCommand == 'productRemovedFromCart') {
  
  dataLayer.push({
      'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
      'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
      'eventAction': 'Product removed from cart',
      'eventLabel': 'productId Is:' + productList[0].productId,
      'eventValue': '{{cartValue}}', // that's expected to be negative
      'ecommerce': {
          'currencyCode': '{{currencyCode}}',
          'remove': {
              'products': {{gaEeDynamicProductObject}}
          }
      }
  });  

// ### each checkout step
} else if(eventCommand == 'checkoutStep') {
  
  dataLayer.push({
  	'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
    'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
    'eventAction': 'Checkout step {{checkoutStepNumber}}',
    'eventLabel': '{{checkoutStepName}} with {{checkoutStepOption}}',
    'eventValue': '{{cartValue}}', 
    'ecommerce': {
      'currencyCode': '{{currencyCode}}',
      'checkout': {
        'actionField': {'step': {{checkoutStepNumber}} ,'option': {{checkoutStepOption}} },
      'products': {{gaEeDynamicProductObject}}
      }
    }
  });  

} else if(eventCommand == 'orderConfirmation') {
  
    dataLayer.push({
  	'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
    'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
    'eventAction': 'Order Confirmation',
    'eventLabel': 'orderId:' + {{orderId}},
    'eventValue': '{{cartValue}}', 
    'ecommerce': {
      'currencyCode': '{{currencyCode}}',
      'purchase': {
        'actionField': {
          'id': {{orderId}},
          'affiliation': {{orderShopName}},
          'revenue': {{orderRevenue}},
          'tax':{{orderTax}},
          'shipping': {{orderShippingCost}},
          'coupon': '{{orderCoupon}}'
        
        },
      'products': {{gaEeDynamicProductObject}}
      }
    }
  });  

} else if(eventCommand == 'productRefund') {
  
    dataLayer.push({
  	'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
    'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
    'eventAction': 'Product Refund',
    'eventLabel': productList[0].productId,
    'eventValue': '0', 
    'ecommerce': {
      'refund': {
        'actionField': {
          'id': {{orderId}},     
        },
      'products': {{gaEeDynamicProductObject}}
      }
    }
  });  

} else if(eventCommand == 'orderRefund') {
  
    dataLayer.push({
  	'event': 'enhancedEcommerce',
    'eventCategory': 'Enhanced Ecommerce',
    'eventAction': 'Order Refund',
    'eventLabel': {{orderId}},
    'eventValue': '0', 
    'ecommerce': {
      'refund': {
        'actionField': {
          'id': {{orderId}},     
        }
      }
    }
  });  
}
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example product Checkout Step tag when you add '?santiano=checkoutStep' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data


var product4Id = 4444;
var product4Name = 'santiano.io Black and White Camera';
var product4Price = '40.00';
var product4Category = 'santiano.io/Cameras/Black and White/Digital';
var productBrand = 'santiano.io';
  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'checkoutStep',
	'currencyCode': 'EUR',
  	'checkoutStepNumber': 1,
	'checkoutStepName' : 'Order Review',
	'checkoutStepOption': 'Free Delivery',

	'productList': [{
    	'productName': product4Name, 
    	'productId': product4Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product4Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product4Category,
        'productVariant': 'Full Frame',
        'productQuantity': 1
   
      
    }] 
});
  
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example order Confirmation tag when you add '?santiano=orderConfirmation' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data


var product4Id = 4444;
var product4Name = 'santiano.io Black and White Camera';
var product4Price = '40.00';
var product4Category = 'santiano.io/Cameras/Black and White/Digital';
var productBrand = 'santiano.io';
  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'orderConfirmation',
	'currencyCode': 'EUR',

	'orderId': 'testOrderID-' + {{randomNumber0-9999}},
	'orderRevenue' : '35.00',
	'orderTax' : '5',
	'orderPaymentMethod': 'Pay at the Order',
	'orderPaymentPlatform': 'Visa via our Bank',
	'orderShippingCost' : '0.00',
	'orderShippingType': 'Free Shipping',
	'orderShopName' : 'santiano.io Ecommerce Test Store',
	'orderCoupon' : 'ABCDEFGHIJK',
	'orderDiscountApplied' : '5',

	'productList': [{
    	'productName': product4Name, 
    	'productId': product4Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product4Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product4Category,
        'productVariant': 'Full Frame',
        'productQuantity': 1
   
      
    }] 
});
  
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example order refund tag when you add '?santiano=orderRefund' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data



  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'orderRefund',
	'orderId': 'RefundedOrderID-' + {{randomNumber0-9999}}
});
  
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example product Added To Cart tag when you add '?santiano=productAddedToCart' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data


var product2Id = 2222;
var product2Name = 'santiano.io Pant';
var product2Price = '20.00';
var product2Category = 'santiano.io/Pants';
var productImpressionListName = 'santiano.io Best Sellers';
var productBrand = 'santiano.io';
  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'productAddedToCart',
	'currencyCode': 'EUR',

	'productList': [{
    	'productName': product2Name, 
    	'productId': product2Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product2Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product2Category,
        'productVariant': 'size:M',
        'productQuantity': 1
   
      
    }] 
});
  
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example product Click tag when you add '?santiano=productClick' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data


var product2Id = 2222;
var product2Name = 'santiano.io Pant';
var product2Price = '20.00';
var product2Category = 'santiano.io/Pants';
var productImpressionListName = 'santiano.io Best Sellers';
var productBrand = 'santiano.io';
  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'productClick',
	'currencyCode': 'EUR',
	'productImpressionListName' : productImpressionListName,

	'productList': [{
    	'productName': product2Name, 
    	'productId': product2Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product2Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product2Category,

        'productImpressionListPosition': 2
    }] 
});
  
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example product Detail tag when you add '?santiano=productDetail' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data


var product2Id = 2222;
var product2Name = 'santiano.io Pant';
var product2Price = '20.00';
var product2Category = 'santiano.io/Pants';
var productBrand = 'santiano.io';
  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'productDetail',
	'currencyCode': 'EUR',

	'productList': [{
    	'productName': product2Name, 
    	'productId': product2Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product2Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product2Category,

        'productImpressionListPosition': 2
    }] 
});
  
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example product impression tag when you add '?santiano=productImpression' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data

var product1Id = 1111;
var product2Id = 2222;
var product3Id = 3333;

var product1Name = 'santiano.io T-Shirt';
var product2Name = 'santiano.io Pant';
var product3Name = 'santiano.io Shoes';

var product1Price = '10.00';
var product2Price = '20.00';
var product3Price = '30.00';

var product1Category = 'santiano.io/T-Shirts';
var product2Category = 'santiano.io/Pants';
var product3Category = 'santiano.io/Shoes';

var productImpressionListName = 'santiano.io Best Sellers';
var productBrand = 'santiano.io';
  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'productImpression',
	'currencyCode': 'EUR',
	'productImpressionListName' : productImpressionListName,

	'productList': [{
    	'productName': product1Name, 
    	'productId': product1Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product1Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product1Category,

        'productImpressionListPosition': 1
    },{
    	'productName': product2Name, 
    	'productId': product2Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product2Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product2Category,

        'productImpressionListPosition': 2
    },
	{
    	'productName': product3Name, 
    	'productId': product3Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product3Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product3Category,
      
        'productImpressionListPosition': 3
    }] 
});
  
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example product Refund tag when you add '?santiano=productRefund' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data


var product4Id = 4444;

  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'productRefund',
	'currencyCode': 'EUR',

	'orderId': 'productRefundOrderID-' + {{randomNumber0-9999}},

	'productList': [{
    	'productId': product4Id,
        'productQuantity': 1
   
      
    }] 
});
  
  
</script>

<script>
// Sends a example product Removed From Cart tag when you add '?santiano=productRemovedFromCart' at the end of your URL
// this is meant to help the Enhanced ecommerce integration and should only be triggered on Dev Environments
// in order not to corrupt any production data


var product2Id = 2222;
var product2Name = 'santiano.io Pant';
var product2Price = '20.00';
var product2Category = 'santiano.io/Pants';
var productImpressionListName = 'santiano.io Best Sellers';
var productBrand = 'santiano.io';
  
dataLayer.push({
	'event': 'santianoEcommerce',
	'eventCommand': 'productRemovedFromCart',
	'currencyCode': 'EUR',

	'productList': [{
    	'productName': product2Name, 
    	'productId': product2Id,
    	'productUnitPrice': product2Price,
        'productBrand': productBrand,
    	'productCategory': product2Category,
        'productVariant': 'size:M',
        'productQuantity': 1
   
      
    }] 
});
  
  
</script>

trigger.name: Click on External Links - Production Only
